name: Wife Massage
description:
“WIFE MASSAGE” is the new game, with one beatiful wife and she needs your help. With awesome and better 3D animation!
All with easy mini puzzles and mini clicker game. Just to click with your mouse in the red area to solve the puzzles.
In the game you will to solve her back problems and help her with a great massage. Maybe you will need to better your techniques as well.
What you can find in the game:
• Beautiful pictures and animations.
• Incredible sound and visual effects.
• Gallery with hot movies, all in 3D!.
